attributes.action: Hold an EU referendum with three choices:- leave, accept terms or remain.
attributes.additional_details: The Leave bus suggested that we would save the UK's gross contribution if we leave. This didn't take into account the rebate we deduct before sending our contribution or the amounts paid to UK companies and institutions by the EU. In plain words, it was a lie.
attributes.background: Vote leave are subject to a police investigation showing that the first referendum wasn't held on an even playing field.
